import pandas as pd
from datetime import datetime

df['date_conv'] = df['date'].apply(lambda x: datetime.strptime(x, "%m-%d-%Y").strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))

#

import pandas as pd
from datetime import datetime

df = inputs[0]
	
df['technical'] = ['sell' if x > y else 'buy' if x < y else 'hold' for x, y in zip(df['EWMA_15'], df['EWMA_20'])]
